title: Kinematic network of joint motion provides insight on gait coordination: An observational study on Parkinson's disease
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Emahnuel Troisi Lopez, Marianna Liparoti, Roberta Minino, Antonella Romano, Arianna Polverino, Anna Carotenuto, Domenico Tafuri, Giuseppe Sorrentino, Pierpaolo Sorrentino
